Name: Visceral Cubes
About the game: What is Visceral Cubes? After losing contact with a space station on mars, you are sent to retrieve a high value item for the company. It didnâ€™t take long for our protagonist to find out that something went very very wrong in this place. With no communication means, there is no other choice but to advance further in the complex. He will face a visceral experience to retrieve the item. Visceral Cubes is a game where you survive by evading your enemies. You can stealth your way past them or run for your life hoping that they don't catch up and explode in your face. FEATURES Simple but challenging gameplay. Physics, watch your enemies explode and make a mess of the environment. Collect key items to advance further into the complex. Find and read left over data of the station screw. Find how what happened! Enjoy an original soundtrack. Steam Achievements.
